app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Dictation App Dictate Anywhere
app_description: Presenting Dictation App your pocket transcription powerhouse! A professional grade service that lets you dictate edit and share documents from anywhere. WHY CHOOSE DICTATION APP Whether you re mobile or stationary your documentation needs never pause. Dictation App eliminates restrictions on dictation length or time letting you voice out anything from a quick note to a full fledged report. SPECIAL FEATURES: Immediate 99 accurate dictation with zero training needed. Create and navigate form based templates with voice commands a lifesaver on the go! Add industry specific words and make custom voice commands for repetitive tasks. Select edit and format text using voice commands or navigate through report templates. Easily import export documents to popular cloud services like Dropbox . Synchronize with compatible desktop apps for a seamless workflow. Remember we need internet connection for our cloud based speech recognition. For assistance contact our support: meta.innovation outlook.com We prioritize your privacy: All communication is secured with top tier encryption. We only access your device s microphone and storage.
